## ReferenceMapKeyPolicy class

Policy object responsible for validating or correcting keys in a [reference map](./ts-json.ijsonreferencemap.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ReferenceMapKeyPolicy<T>
```
